CustomField.description: Future Recommendation is to leverage Salesforce Trigger or Flow
CustomField.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "ACT", ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Draft"), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Coordinators__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Manager__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PNNL_ACT_Office2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PNNL_IP_Approver__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PNSOACTReviewer__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PNSO_Coordinator2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PNSO_Technical_Rep2__c)) )
CustomField.label: ACT Submit Approval Checkbox
